com.swopteam07.tablr.UI

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swopteam07.tablr.UI.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Component>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Container, DrawableComponent, Scrollbar

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Component>
    A class representing a basic UI component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Component

        public Component(int x,
                 int y,
                 int height,
                 int width,
                 boolean visible,
                 Component parent)
        Create a new component with the given dimensions and visibility state.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the component.relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        height - The height of the component.
        width - The width of the component.
        visible - The visibility state of the new component.
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effects:
      • The x coordinate of the new component will be equal to the given x coordinate.
            setX(x)
      • The y coordinate of the new component will be equal to the given y coordinate.
            setY(y)
      • The height of the new component will be equal to the given height.
            setHeight(height)
      • The width of the new component will be equal to the given width.
            setWidth(width)
      • The visibility state of the new component will be equal to the given visibility state.
            setVisible(visible)
      • The component is not selected.
            setSelected(false)
      • The component can be unselected if selected.
            setAllowsUnselect(true)
      • The component can be selected.
            setCanBeSelected(true)
      • The component is valid.
            setValid(true)

      • Component

        public Component(int x,
                 int y,
                 int height,
                 int width,
                 Component parent)
        Create a new visible component with the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the component.relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        height - The height of the component.
        width - The width of the component.
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effect:
        The component is initialized with the given parameters.
            this(x, y, height, width, true, parent)

      • Component

        public Component(Component parent)
        Initialize a component to have a 0 surface area.
        Parameters:
        parent - The component that contains this component or null if this component has no parent.
        Effect:
        The component is initialized with 0 for all parameters.
            this(0, 0, 0, 0, parent)

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int x,
                        int y)
        Check if a given coordinate is contained within this component.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to check for.
        y - The y coordinate to check for.
        Returns:
        False if the given x coordinate is smaller than the x coordinate of the top left corner of the component.
            if (x < getDrawX() - getMargin())
              result == false  False if the given y coordinate is smaller than the y coordinate of the top left corner of the component.
            else if (y < getDrawY() - getMargin())
              result == false  False if the given x coordinate is not smaller than the top left x coordinate incremented with the width.
            else if (x > getDrawX() + getWidth() + getMargin())
              result == false  False if the given y coordinate is not smaller than the top left y coordinate incremented with the height.
            else if (y > getDrawY() + getHeight() + getMargin())
              result == false  True in all other cases.
            else
              result == true

      • setX

        public void setX(int x)
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.
        Postcondition:
        The new x coordinate will be equal to the given value.
            new.getX() == x

      • getX

        public final int getX()
        Returns:
        The x coordinate of the top left corner of the component relative to the parent component if it exists or the window if it doesn't.

      • getDrawX

        public int getDrawX()
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Postcondition:

            new.isVisible() == visible

      • isVisible

        public final boolean isVisible()
        Returns:
        True if the component is visible, false otherwise.

      • unselect

        public void unselect()
        Ensure that this component is not selected.
        Effect:
        This component is not selected.
            setSelected(false)

      • setSelected

        Parameters:
        selected - The new value for the selected field.
        Postcondition:
        The new selected value is equal to the given value.
            new.isSelected() == selected

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected()
        Returns:
        True if the component is selected, false otherwise.

        public final boolean allowsUnselect()
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        canBeSelected - The new value.

      • canBeSelected

        public final boolean canBeSelected()
        Returns:
        True if the component can be selected, false otherwise.

      • translateX

        public void translateX(int x)
        Translate the component along the x axis.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to be used for the translation.
        Postcondition:
        If the given value produces a negative coordinate the new value of x will be 0.
            if (getX() + x < 0)
               new.getX() == 0  Other wise the new value of x will be the current value added with the translation value.
            else
               new.getX() == getX() + x

      • translateY

        public void translateY(int y)
        Translate the component along the y axis.
        Parameters:
        y - The value to be used for the translation.
        Postcondition:
        If the given value produces a negative coordinate the new value of y will be 0.
            if (getY() + y < 0)
               new.getY() == 0  Other wise the new value of y will be the current value added with the translation value.
            else
               new.getY() == getY() + y

        Parameters:
        key - The attribute for which to get the color.
        Returns:
        The color used when drawing an element that uses the specified attribute.

        color - The color used when drawing an element that uses the specified attribute.

      • handleClickEvent

        public void handleClickEvent(int id,
                             int x,
                             int y,
                             int clickCount)
        Deal with a user clicking on the component.
        Parameters:
        id - The type of mouse event.
        x - The x coordinate of the mouse click.
        y - The y coordinate of the mouse click.
        clickCount - The number of times that was clicked.
        Effect:
        Unselect all components.
            unselect()

      • handleKeyEvent

        public void handleKeyEvent(int id,
                           int keyCode,
                           char keyChar)
        Deal with a user pressing a key.
        Parameters:
        id - The type of key event.
        keyCode - The number of key that was pressed.
        keyChar - The character that was typed.

        Parameters:

        public void addMouseClickListener(MouseClickListener mouseClickListener)
        Add a new mouse click listener.
        Parameters:

      • setZIndex

        public void setZIndex(int zIndex)
        Set a new value for the z-index of this component. A higher index indicates that the component will be drawn later than components with a lower z-index.
        Parameters:
        zIndex - The new index.
        Postcondition:
        The new zIndex is equal to the specified z-index.
            new.getZIndex() == zIndex

      • getZIndex

        public int getZIndex()
        Returns:
        The z-index of this component.

      • getParent

        public Component getParent()
        Returns:
        The parent of this component, can be null.

      • setParent

        protected void setParent(Component parent)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Component other)
        Compare the components based on their z-index.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Component>
        Parameters:
        other - The component to compare this component to.
        Returns:
        If the z index of this component is lower than the z index of the other component the result is -1

      • paint

        protected void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draw this component on a canvas.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object on which to paint.
